original_text: The length of each curtain was thirty cubits, and the breadth of each curtain four cubits. The eleven curtains were the same size.
korean_text: 각 폭의 길이는 서른 규빗, 너비는 네 규빗으로 열한 폭의 장단을 같게 하여

sentences.original_text: The length of each curtain was thirty cubits
and the breadth of each curtain four cubits
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 각 휘장의 너비는 사 규빗이었습니다.

sentences.original_text: The eleven curtains were the same size
sentences.korean_translation: 열한 개의 휘장은 모두 같은 크기였습니다.
